name: FDA App
changes: Implemented version check upon start. If the app version is not the latest, the app shows error and prevents user to use.
Implemented internet connection check. If no internet connection, the app shows error and prevents user to use.
Implemented signal quality check. If signal quality less then 0.6, the app shows error.
Use HD (1080p) for the camera resolution
issues: This version use HD for the camera resolution, devices older than iPhone 13 Pro and iPad Air 5th generation may get the error message: "Camera quality is to low, please try again".

name: Data Collection App
changes: Support USB download (via iTunes File Sharing)
Remote Control: Support deleting files, and listing files
Improved error and boundary cases handling
issues: WiFi download is not 100% stable. If this problem happens, use USB or AirDrop download as workarounds.

name: Vitals™ Mobile App
changes: Added one UDID to the profile.
issues: Breathing animation in scanning screen has not been updated
BMI result is missing

name: FDA App
changes: In starting page, added "(KG)" beside the weight and "(CM)" beside the height.
When the lighting condition is not fulfilled, display message: "Please ensure that your face is evenly and adequately lit.".
When the distance condition is not fulfilled, display message: "Please center your face within the silhouette at a suitable distance.".
When the centered condition is not fulfilled, display message: "Please center your face within the silhouette.".
When the movements condition is not fulfilled, display message: "Please keep the device stable and remain still.".
When the server ready condition is not fulfilled, display message: "Please wait until the server is ready.".
The scan cannot be started if the app can't get the camera permission, it will prompt user with a dialog box and ask for the permission again.
Added a button to show the settings.
issues: No known issue

issues: No known issue
